thread.title: Gail Daschel
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Gail Daschel

author: Gail Daschel
title: Gail Daschel
text: I recently ordered some Maui Jim prescription sunglasses. I was very nervous to order something like this online but the savings in cost pushed me to do it. I called and a very nice, knowledgeable and professional person by the name of Nelly walked me through the order. But they don't disappear after that. I got follow-up emails to let me know where they were in the process and when they would be mailing them. I even got a phone call to tell that they had sent them. You could not ask for better customer service! When I received my glasses and put them on they were perfect! Highly recommend!!
